page.title: 04BREDENBURY SCHOOL
page.content: Bredenbury School was built in 1874 as Grendon Bishop U.D. Board School.To-day there are 69 children in the school.42 travel on the school bus from out-lying areas.There are 3 classes, Infants,Lower Junior and Upper Junior. There are 24 infants, 23 Lower Juniors and 22 Upper Juniors.On the staff are Mr.Evans( head-master), Mrs.Evans, Mrs.Brunt,Mrs. Poole, Mrs.Bandfield(secretary),Mrs.Williams (pink lady) and Mrs.Green(caretaker). Every Friday we have games.Every year we have a Sport's day.We play foot ball and net ball.On wednesday we go swimming in Leominster.We play in the Wigmore Tournament and Bromyard Tournament.At the end of term we have prize giving for our work.
